original_title: Willie Mays and the Say-Hey Kid
overview: A guardian angel agrees to help Willie Mays win the National League Pennant if Mays agrees to take care of Veronica, a lonely, mischievous orphan girl. Veronica makes Mays' life difficult, but when relatives show up to claim her after hearing that she's inherited money, Mays' heart softens.
title: Willie Mays and the Say-Hey Kid
